title: Request a Time Extension
description: Due to a client-caused delay, a PM needs to submit a formal request for a contract time extension.

tasks.description: Document the client-caused delay, including its start date, end date, and impact on the critical path.
Draft a formal contract modification request for a time extension, citing the relevant contract clauses.
Submit the request to the client for their approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The time extension request is sent to the client.
